General.Name: Zhejiang Jihua Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Jihua Group Co., Ltd. operates in the dyestuff industry. The company produces and sells disperse, reactive, acid, direct, and vulcanizing dyes. It also provides dyestuff intermediates, H acid, synthetic-anthraquinone products, macromolecular materials, and polyurethane foams. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 1766, New Century Avenue, Hangzhou, China, 311228
